info.name: Highlight the best and worst comments on YouTube
info.description:
Easily distinguish most thumbed up comments and
thumbed down comments (also you can now know how exacly thumbs
each comment has just by looking at right bottom corner of it)

Whiten "liked" comments and darker "disliked" ones with
this easy to use lightweight style.
info.additionalInfo:
total white background for comments with 2 likes or more
very light, white background for comments with just 1 like
very light, dark background for comments with 1 dislike or more

*update - fixed unpopular comment rating color
